channel.title: Delta~ Special attack Problem ~317
channel.description:
hello guys ive got a special attack problem.
My specials are 100% working etc. But i have one problem! When i click on the special attack bar it wont say my specail is on! You dont see it. Till you move or eat something. It is just like it dont update after you click on it.
Is there a fix for this? Please help meh :P
Youridudock
